member.name: T:MemoryCache.Plugin.Classes.MemoryCacheMenu
member.summary:
Returns statistical data on the usage of available memory caches and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:MemoryCache.Plugin.Classes.MemoryCacheMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns data on the number of MemoryCaches in use, the number of items and age available in MemoryCachePlugin requests.

member.name: M:MemoryCache.Plugin.Classes.PluginVersion.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the current internal plugin version supported by MemoryCachePlugin

member.name: T:MemoryCache.Plugin.MemoryClassPluginSettings
member.summary: Provides settings loaded by ISettingsProvider that determine how MemoryCachePlugin is configures.

member.name: P:MemoryCache.Plugin.MemoryClassPluginSettings.DefaultCacheDuration
member.summary:
Default number of minutes the default cache stores items.
Default: 120 minutes. Minimum: 30 minutes. Maximum: 2880 minutes.

member.name: P:MemoryCache.Plugin.MemoryClassPluginSettings.ShortCacheDuration
member.summary:
Default number of minutes the short cache stores items.
Default: 5 minutes. Minimum: 1 minutes. Maximum: 60 minutes.

member.name: M:MemoryCache.Plugin.MemoryCachePluginExtender.UseMemoryCache(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary:
IServiceCollection extender method.
Allows easy use of registering MemoryCachePlugin services

member.name: T:MemoryCache.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the MemoryCache.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
